title: Spider Forest and Lavenders
author: JGray
text:
Theresa's ability to come up with strategy on the fly is one of her greatest skills but this time, it won't do her much good...

Mysteries of the Arcana has been invited into the SpiderForest collective. It has no effect on the comic for most readers, except that there's now a neat little header up above that advertises some pretty nifty comics!

In other news, Keith is drawing a new comic called the Lavenders. I highly recommend you check it out!
